info.name: DarkDarkGo
info.description:
Inspired by Chrome's incognito/dark mode color schemes. Blends in perfectly.
IMPORTANT: To activate the theme, select the dark theme in DuckDuckGo (open the settings menu on the right, select the palette on the far right)
info.additionalInfo:
To modify the source, clone https://github.com/Frizbunny/darkdarkgo-2 and follow the instructions from the readme.

If you have modified DuckDuckGo's theme in the settings, it likely won't affect much. Even still, backing it up and resetting to default is recommended.
